description.1: The cottage is located in the Verdon regional park: between Barreme and Castellanne: The house is located at the top of the village; here we are 73 inhabitants! If you like nature and peace, this establishment is for you! Nearby you will find many places of interest such as canyoning skiing in winter visiting a lavender distillery and many picturesque villages on multiple hiking trails around the house; Of course, you are at the gates of the Verdon gorges and the lakes and rivers are a must! Welcome to lovers of nature and the great outdoors!
